p: Besides the time constraints associated with the emergency situation, the central argument that justifies the transfer of political authority to experts in at least a circumscribed realm is that the criteria for ‘correct’ political decisions are clear anyway and that it is now simply a matter of implementing them on the basis of adequate information. At the beginning of the Covid-19 pandemic, the primary concern had to be limiting infections and deaths while at the same time containing the economic damage. In the case of the climate crisis, the top priority is to reduce emissions of greenhouse gases as quickly as possible and to ultimately bring them to a halt.
